unnormalised: Arre, cart abandonment? That's like promising your Amma you'll be home by 7 PM for chai and pakoras, then ghosting her! Did Sharmaji's online store scare you with those shipping costs? Don't be shy, come back! We've got discounts sweeter than jalebis on Diwali (24/10/2022). Maybe you just needed a *muhurat* (auspicious time)? It's always a good time at 11:11 AM. Think of the poor courier guy, waiting on 16/05/2024 at 3 PM! #cartcomeback
normalised: Arre, cart abandonment? That's like promising your Amma you will be home by seven P M for chai and pakoras, then ghosting her!
